bio.summary: Wilber Pan (traditional Chinese: 潘瑋柏; simplified Chinese: 潘玮柏; pinyin: Pān Wěibò, born 6 August 1980), also known as Will Pan, is a popular American-born Taiwanese singer, rapper and drama actor, who started his career as a host of Channel V programs. Pan was born in West Virginia, United States and later moved to Taiwan at the age of seven. He attended Taipei American School and graduated in 1999. Because of his multicultural background, he is fluent in both Mandarin and American English. Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: Wilber Pan (traditional Chinese: 潘瑋柏; simplified Chinese: 潘玮柏; pinyin: Pān Wěibò, born 6 August 1980), also known as Will Pan, is a popular American-born Taiwanese singer, rapper and drama actor, who started his career as a host of Channel V programs. Pan was born in West Virginia, United States and later moved to Taiwan at the age of seven. He attended Taipei American School and graduated in 1999. Because of his multicultural background, he is fluent in both Mandarin and American English. Before launching his acting and singing career, he attended California State Polytechnic University in the United States. He still retains his dual citizenship in the U.S.A. and Taiwan. He is also famous for doing several cover songs of other artists. His album, released in 2007, is Play It Cool (玩酷). His most successful song, Have to Love, is a remake of the Korean song Please Tell Me Why, originally recorded by rap artist Freestyle. He was also featured alongside Christina Milian for the Asian exclusive remix of Dip It Low. He is currently featured in advertisements for Coca-Cola and Family Mart convenience stores in Taiwan. His most recent project is filming a Taiwanese drama called Miss No Good alongside Rainie Yang. His latest album 007 was released in 2009 and includes the song "Be With You", a collaborate with Akon. Discography: Albums Gecko Stroll / 壁虎漫步 - December 20, 2002 Pass Me The Mic / 我的麥克風 - September 19, 2003 Wu Ha - September 03, 2004 Expert / 高手 - July 08, 2005 Freestyle Remix / 時尚混音酷樂 Freestyle Remix - December 16, 2005 Around the World / 反轉地球 - June 23, 2006 Play It Cool / 玩酷 - September 14, 2007 Will's Future / Will's未來式 (2CD+DVD) - July 18, 2008 007 - May 29, 2009 Read more on Last.fm.
